name: Skill and Job Profile Data Enrichment
title: Skill and Job Profile Data Enrichment
tool_name: Skill and Job Profile Data Enrichment

api_list.name: Skill Data Enrichment
api_list.description: Skill Data Enrichment API offers you a detailed information of skill based on search keyword.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skill-and-job-profile-data-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com/skillsearch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skill-and-job-profile-data-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
